    • Field Detail

      • commitsMap

        public static final ConcurrentHashMap<UUID,LockFreeTransaction> commitsMap
        Maps all node local LockFreeTransactions using their id as key. Whoever completes the processing is required to remove the entry from this map, lest it grow indefinitely with the number of transactions.

      • commitRequest

        protected final CommitRequest commitRequest

      • txVersionToCommitIdMap

        public static final ConcurrentHashMap<Integer,UUID> txVersionToCommitIdMap

    • Method Detail

      • isWriteTransaction

        public boolean isWriteTransaction()
        Overrides:
        isWriteTransaction in class jvstm.TopLevelTransaction

      • localCommit

        public void localCommit()
        This is the commit algorithm that each CommitOnlyTransaction performs on each node, regardless of whether it is a LocalCommitOnlyTransaction or a RemoteCommitOnlyTransaction. Note that LockFreeTransactions are decorated by CommitOnlyTransactions.

      • getUnderlyingTransaction

        public abstract jvstm.TopLevelTransaction getUnderlyingTransaction()
        Get the concrete transaction that will be committed. For local commits this should be the local tx instance, help by the LocalCommitOnlyTransaction. For remote commits this should be the RemoteCommitOnlyTransaction instance itself.
